definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: We didn't like him, as he always fawned on the rich.
sentences.chinese: 我們不喜歡他，因爲他老是巴結有錢人。

sentences.english: Filthy rich people are not not necessarily good-respected unless you possess noble characters.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人未必受人尊敬，除非有高尚的品格。

sentences.english: I wish I were cout out to be a millionaire.
sentences.chinese: 真希望我以後會成爲有錢人。

sentences.english: The building of this house in the shape of the temple was a rich man's vagary.
sentences.chinese: 這個建築物的格局以有錢人的奇想爲形式。

sentences.english: If rich people buy food abuse, that and no difference also fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 如果有錢人買糧食糟蹋，那和趁火打劫也沒有差別。

sentences.english: She will wed her daughter to a rich man.
sentences.chinese: 她準備把女兒嫁給有錢人。

sentences.english: I don't like Toby, as he always fawns on the rich.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡託比，因爲他老是向有錢人獻殷勤。

sentences.english: Everyday, Wang Mian go out very early in the morning to feed the cattle for the toff.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上，王冕很早就出門給有錢人放牛。

sentences.english: We really should try and get her married off to a wealthy businessman.
sentences.chinese: 我們真該試試找個有錢人把她嫁出去纔對。

sentences.english: He betrothed his daughter to a rich man.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的女兒許配給一個有錢人。

sentences.english: The view that all wealthy people are evil will result in hatred for wealth.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人都是黑心腸的觀點，會導致仇富心理的產生。

sentences.english: To well-to-do people higer prices mean better quality.
sentences.chinese: 對這些有錢人來說，高價位意味着高品質。

sentences.english: The building of this house in the shape of the temple was a rich man's vagary.
sentences.chinese: 建設這棟寺廟形狀的房子是一個有錢人的奇思妙想。

sentences.english: Rich people never buy cheap goods from vendors at the roadside.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人從來不買路邊攤子上的賤物。

sentences.english: They were rich men. They were also nasty men.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是有錢人，但也都是卑鄙齷齪的傢伙。

sentences.english: Wealthy men gave fancy balls to honor their valentines.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人用花球充當自己的情人節禮物。
